sentences.en: Don't omit locking [ to lock ] the door.
Don't omit this paragraph when you write your report.
sentences.cn: 写报告时不要删去这一节.

sentences.en: I'll not wish to omit this valuable book from my reading.
sentences.cn: 我可不愿在自己的阅读书目中漏掉这本有价值的书.

sentences.en: If omit the personage, the crown on the head remains shining.
sentences.cn: 如果将人物删除, 那头顶上的光环依旧.

sentences.en: In writing telegrams omit superfluous words.
sentences.cn: 写电报稿要省去不必要的文字。
写电报稿要省去不必要的文字.

sentences.en: Omit no harsh line , smooth away no displeasing irregularity.
sentences.cn: 不能省略任何刺眼的纹路, 不能掩饰任何讨厌的丑处.

sentences.en: Omit the salt in this recipe.
sentences.cn: 省略菜谱中放盐这一步。

sentences.en: Please don't omit to lock the door when you leave.
Please don’t omit any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
sentences.cn: 请不要忽略任何细节，不管它多细小。

sentences.en: Tell us everything that occurred; don't omit anything.
sentences.cn: 告诉我发生的一切. 不要遗漏任何东西.

sentences.en: That was a phrase he might omit.
sentences.cn: 这种词儿他还是不讲为妙.

sentences.en: This common prudence should have now induced him to omit.
sentences.cn: 按通常的审慎做法,他本来应该免掉这件事的.

sentences.en: We now omit the prime on the matrix elements.
sentences.cn: 我们现在把各矩阵元素上的一撇略去.

trans.tran_en: to not include someone or something, either deliberately or because you forget to do it
to not include someone or something, either deliberately or because you forget to do it
